Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and value, we believe it's worth more than $10000 to you. Considering its true worth, I propose a special introductory price of $14000 for you. This offer includes all the benefits and features that come with the product, ensuring you receive the best possible experience. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own something truly remarkable. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
